q1.a: QuizFlow is an AI-powered online quiz platform that helps you quickly create, share, and manage online quizzes.

q2.q: How does AI question generation work?
q2.a: Simply enter a topic and the number of questions, and AI will automatically generate high-quality questions with options and explanations.

q3.a: We support single choice, multiple choice, true/false, fill-in-the-blank, short answer, and essay questions.
